pr_title: Fixes #1244: Incorrect pagination with ToMany filtering

timeline.message: Fixes #1244: Incorrect pagination with ToMany filtering
Fixes #1244: Incorrect pagination with ToMany filtering

timeline.bodyText:
There's a more readable way to build these using a parser:
filterParser.parseFilterExpression("name==drum", Item.class, false);
timeline.author: aklish

replies.bodyText: ok, I just copied this from other test :)
replies.author: bukajsytlos

timeline.bodyText: Can we test the exception behavior as well?
timeline.author: aklish

replies.bodyText: yes, there is/are failing tests right now because of this, but I am struggling little bit with running and debugging them locally. when I resolve that, I'll try to write test for this case
replies.author: bukajsytlos
